<RpcMethod method="sendTransaction"/>

## Examples

### Request

<ExampleRequest method="sendTransaction" params={{transaction: ""}} />

### Response

```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 8675309,
  "result": {
    "hash": "a01441a4d0b80769d2c2d97dcd28d13e9036065da14ea83731424d77efc50894",
    "status": "PENDING",
    "latestLedger": "45075181",
    "latestLedgerCloseTime": "1677115742"
  }
}
```
